material_1.name: [Mn(Me-ip)(DMF)]n
material_1.synthetic_procedure: A mixture of Mn(CH3COO)2·4H2O (0.25 mmol, 0.061 g), 5-methylisophthalic acid (0.50 mmol, 0.089 g) and LiNO3 (0.50 mmol, 0.035 g) was kept in a 20 mL of Teflon-lined stainless steel vessel with 5 ml DMF (N,N-dimethylformamide), and was heated at 160 °C for 2 days under autogenous pressure. After cooling to room temperature, colorless needle-like crystals of 1 were obtained.

material_2.name: not given
material_2.synthetic_procedure: The de-DMF sample 2 was prepared by heating the as-synthesis sample 1 at 250 °C under vacuum for 8 h for the magnetic, EPR, PXRD and IR measurements.

material_3.name: not given
material_3.synthetic_procedure: The re-DMF sample 1′ was prepared by immersing the de-DMF sample 2 in DMF at room temperature for 48 h for PXRD, EPR and IR measurements.

material_4.name: not given
material_4.synthetic_procedure: The de-DMF sample 2′ was prepared by heating sample 1′ at 250 °C under vacuum for 8 h for the EPR, PXRD and IR measurements.
